about_the_game:
Stoner Fueled Roleplaying Adventure

Hell’s Mouth is a stoner fueled single-player RPG where you live a life as a cannabis user looking to earn some cash. You get to grow weed, sell weed and of course smoke weed. The game includes minigames for grinding, growing and rolling weed. The main gameplay is a top-down adventure through-out a city inspired by Helmond. You collect resources and fight enemies while going on all sorts of quests earning yourself skill points for the next upgrade you treat yourself with.


You make your own story

In this game you can customize your character’s gender, hair, clothing and coloring in any way you like, but that’s not all. The joints you roll are in fact a customizable power up you crafted yourself. Unlock the abilities in the skilltree to roll any kind of tip, find yourself the cannabis strain with the best effects for your situation, and be prepared for your next encounter.




The game contains all sorts of items to supplement smoking and growing, as well as a bunch of iconic dutch products such as energy drinks. While playing you will get to meet all sorts of cultures and people living in Hell’s Mouth. Not all drugs get treated the same way by the law in Hell’s Mouth, which constructs conflict in the city. Criminal activity is rising and you are in the middle of the action.

content_descriptors.notes: TRIGGER WARNING: This game contains nudity, sexual topics, alcoholism and drug abuse. it's all brought in a comedic sense, but be warned!

short_description: Stoner Fueled Singleplayer RPG set in a city inspired by Helmond. Become the most OG smoker there is and build a weed empire in the society of Hell's Mouth. Fight enemies in the real-time combat system. Roam the open world while completing quests you run into.
